thread.title: Man City news and transfers LIVE Aguero future, Otamendi Real Madrid interest
thread.title_full: Man City news and transfers LIVE Aguero future, Otamendi Real Madrid interest

author: James Robson
title: Man City news and transfers LIVE Aguero future, Otamendi Real Madrid interest
text:
Sport Man City news and transfers LIVE Aguero future, Otamendi Real Madrid interest Manchester City are in Abu Dhabi on a warm weather training break ahead of their FA Cup replay against Huddersfield Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Pep on Sergio Aguero penalty decision Share this video Watch Next 
Sergio Aguero sent a timely reminder to Pep Guardiola with his two goals against Monaco - and he's made it clear he's ready to fight for his future at Manchester City . 
The injury to Gabriel Jesus means he has the chance to stake his case between now and the end of the season - and his performance in the 5-3 Champions League last 16 win on Tuesday was teh perfect start. 
Another Argentine whose future is uncertain is Nicolas Otamendi. 
According to the centre back's agent, he could be a target for Real Madrid, who will be looking for a replacement for Pepe in the summer. 
City's stars like Raheem Sterling , Leroy Sane and John Stones headed off to Abu Dhabi immediately after the Monaco game to take part in a warm weather training break before the FA Cup fifth round replay with Huddersfield next week. 
Stick with us all day for all the news and transfer rumours from the Etihad. Key Events
